titles.title: Local Control and Fair Housing Reform Act of 1997
To amend the Fair Housing Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 7/30/1997--Introduced. Local Control and Fair Housing Reform Act of 1997 - Amends the Fair Housing Act to: (1) provide that fair housing provisions shall not limit a reasonable local, State, or Federal restriction on the maximum number of unrelated persons occupying a dwelling or dwelling proximity if such restriction's purpose is to restrict land use to single family dwellings; and (2) protect the right to seek redress, including legal action, under such Act.
